page.title: 14The Life of a Child
page.content: In Cathcart there is a girl called Shirley Stuart. Shirley likes her home very much probably because at the gable end of the garden there is a fence splitting it from a playing field. The area around Shirley's home is very big and she enjoys it very much. She goes down to the field and makes it a bit safer for the dogs by covering up the broken glass with either cut up old boxes or she goes to old dens that are no longer used and looks for carpets. Shirley goes to her local shopping area. Shops there have lots of things to choose from. When it comes to birthdays her mum takes her to new shops where there are lots of new toys to choose from. Shirley is my sister and she is 9 years old and my name is Shona and I will be 11 in July.
